page.title: 06TRADE
page.content: During June 1985 a{new shopping {precinct}was opened in Sandbach. It is the first new shopping development in the town for many years.The precinct has been constructed in an area which was previously an eye-sore.The construction work was completed by Marath Construction Ltd. of Nuneaton. The design of the precinct (by Mitchell Gray Associates of Sandbach) is such that it blends with the century old market and town hall. The precinct is a traffic free area consisting of 6 small shop units, one large shop unit, a supermarket unit and one office unit.At the same time as the constuction of the precinct alterations to the doctors surgery nearby were undertaken so that it also blended with the new building.Above the surgery there is 2,500 sq.ft.of office accomadation.
